title: Jody Miller, Singer of ‘Queen of the House’ and More, Dies at 80
description: Best known for a 1965 homemaker’s reply to a hobo’s refrain, the Oklahoma native had a hit the same year with the very different “Home of the Brave.”
dc:creator: Ed Shanahan

media:content.media:description: The singer Jody Miller in an undated photo. “I like to sing all kinds of songs,” she said, “so I didn’t fit into a mold.”
